abstract: Mr. Baldwin's podcast, called "Here's the Thing," will make its debut on Oct. 24 with an interview with Michael Douglas.
snippet: Mr. Baldwin's podcast, called "Here's the Thing," will make its debut on Oct. 24 with an interview with Michael Douglas.

headline.main: Does He Have Your Attention? Alec Baldwin to Host Podcast for WNYC
headline.print_headline: Alec Baldwin to Host A Podcast for WNYC
